description: Yuno, sometimes called "Yunocchi" by http://anidb.net/ch7057 [Miyako], is a young girl and main character in the story. She lives in the Sunshine Apartments, along with her close friends and neighbors Miyako, http://anidb.net/ch7058 [Hiro], and http://anidb.net/ch7059 [Sae]. Her friends think of her as a very nice person. Yuno dreams of being a great artist someday. Although she is a skilled artist overall, she considers painting and drawing her specialties. She rarely takes off a pair of X-shaped black hairpins.
name: Yuno
